blogposts.title: Selection Sort
blogposts.description: It works by repeatedly selecting elements from the unsorted portion of the list.

blogposts.title: Bubble Sort
blogposts.description: Bubble Sort is the simplest sorting algorithm.

blogposts.title: Insertion Sort
blogposts.description: It works by iteratively inserting each element of an unsorted list into its correct position.
